description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger A creature touches you, such as by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple]{Grappling} you, successfully hitting you with an unarmed attack, or using a touch-range spell against you

Effect You exude a deadly toxin. The triggering creature takes @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d4[poison]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4.
